Package de.hpi.semrecsys.config

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeSimilarityMap
    Container for attribute similarity Entity -> Entity, Double
    ColorEntity
    Entity used for representation of colors
    ColorSimilarity
    Container for color similarity values ColorEntity -> ColorEntity, Double
    ColorUtils
    Java Code to get a color name from rgb/hex value/awt color The part of looking up a color name from the rgb values is edited from https://gist.github.com/nightlark/6482130#file-gistfile1-java (that has some errors) by Ryan Mast (nightlark)
    ConfiguratorParameters
    Container for configuration parameters
    CustomAttributeSimilarityCreator
    calculates attribute similarity map for each attribute type
    HibernateConfigurator
    Configurates Hibernate
    JSONProperties
    Container for properties from properties/customer/properties.json file
    RecommenderProperties
    Properties container for properties/main.properties file
    SemRecSysConfigurator
    Main configuration class.
    SemRecSysConfiguratorData
    Helper class for configuration objects
  • Enum Summary

    SemRecSysConfigurator.Customer
    Customer name
    SemRecSysConfiguratorData.LanguageCode
